text: Sun City is a city in Barber County, Kansas, United States, along the Medicine Lodge River. As of the 2020 census, 37 people lived there. == History == Sun City was founded in 1872. The first post office in Sun City was founded in August 1873. == Geography == Sun City is at (37.379041, -98.917485). According to the United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of . All of it is land. === Climate === Sun City has hot, humid summers and generally mild to cool winters.
